request.description:
**API request to get all submission details.**

StartFragment

BaseUrl: [https://lms-api-hackathon-june2023-930a8b0f895d.herokuapp.com/lms](https://lms-api-hackathon-june2023-930a8b0f895d.herokuapp.com/lms)

Endpoint: /assignmentsubmission

Response body: 

\[    {

        "submissionId": 0,

        "assignmentId": 0,

        "userId": "string",

        "subDesc": "string",

        "subComments": "string",

        "subPathAttach1": "string",

        "subPathAttach2": "string",

        "subPathAttach3": "String",

        "subPathAttach4": "string",

        "subPathAttach5": "string",

        "subDateTime": "string",

        "gradedBy": 0,

        "gradedDateTime": "string",

        "grade": 0

    }\]

Status Code : 200 Ok

  

EndFragment

request.description:
Submit new Assignment using POST request.

StartFragment

Notes: 

- When assignment Submission has to be made, make sure the assignment submitted is present and its associated batchID is also present.
- Submission Date in Assignment Submission should be less than or equal to DUE_Date in Assignment. Then only submission is possible
- Submission Date in Assignment Submission is of timestamp datatype so the Date should be entered in   MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss
- An assignment can be resubmitted(PUT operation from Postman) as many times by the same user until the assignment's due date.
- Grading can happen only after the assignment's due date is passed. Till that time, grading will not accept any values and will show the grade value as ‘-1’ which is a placeholder.  ‘GradedBy’ is a String and can be any user
    

  

BaseUrl: [https://lms-api-hackathon-june2023-930a8b0f895d.herokuapp.com/lms](https://lms-api-hackathon-june2023-930a8b0f895d.herokuapp.com/lms)

Endpoint: /assignmentsubmission

StartFragment

  

Request Body : 

\[    {        "assignmentId": 0,

        "userId": "string",

        "subDesc": "string",

        "subComments": "string",

        "subPathAttach1": "string",

        "subPathAttach2": "string",

        "subPathAttach3": "String",

        "subPathAttach4": "string",

        "subPathAttach5": "string",

        "subDateTime": "string",

        "gradedBy": 0,

        "gradedDateTime": "string",

        "grade": 0

    }\]

Mandatory : subDateTime, assignmentID , UserId , Submission description 

Autogenerated : submissionID

  

Response body : 

\[    {   "submissionId": 0,

        "assignmentId": 0,

        "userId": "string",

        "subDesc": "string",

        "subComments": "string",

        "subPathAttach1": "string",

        "subPathAttach2": "string",

        "subPathAttach3": "String",

        "subPathAttach4": "string",

        "subPathAttach5": "string",

        "subDateTime": "string",

        "gradedBy": 0,

        "gradedDateTime": "string",        "grade": 0      }\]

  

Status Code : 201 created, 404 not Found with message and boolean success details.

  

EndFragment

  
  

  

EndFragment

StartFragment

1. ### Resubmit Assignment
    

  

BaseUrl: [https://lms-api-hackathon-june2023-930a8b0f895d.herokuapp.com/lms](https://lms-api-hackathon-june2023-930a8b0f895d.herokuapp.com/lms)

Endpoint: /assignmentsubmission/{Id}

Request Body : 

\[    {

        "assignmentId": 0,

        "userId": "string",

        "subDesc": "string",

        "subComments": "string",

        "subPathAttach1": "string",

        "subPathAttach2": "string",

        "subPathAttach3": "String",

        "subPathAttach4": "string",

        "subPathAttach5": "string",

        "subDateTime": "string",

        "gradedBy": 0,

        "gradedDateTime": "string",

        "grade": 0

    }\]

  

Mandatory : subDateTime, assignmentID , UserId , Submission description 

Response body : 

\[    {   "submissionId": 0,

        "assignmentId": 0,

        "userId": "string",

        "subDesc": "string",

        "subComments": "string",

        "subPathAttach1": "string",

        "subPathAttach2": "string",

        "subPathAttach3": "String",

        "subPathAttach4": "string",

        "subPathAttach5": "string",

        "subDateTime": "string",

        "gradedBy": 0,

        "gradedDateTime": "string",        "grade": 0      }\]

  
  

Status Code : 200 OK, 404 not Found with message and boolean success details.

StartFragment

1. ### Grade Assignment Submission
    

  

BaseUrl: [https://lms-api-hackathon-june2023-930a8b0f895d.herokuapp.com/lms](https://lms-api-hackathon-june2023-930a8b0f895d.herokuapp.com/lms)

Endpoint: /assignmentsubmission/gradesubmission/{submissionId}

Request Body : 

\[    {

        "assignmentId": 0,

        "userId": "string",

        "subDesc": "string",

        "subComments": "string",

        "subPathAttach1": "string",

        "subPathAttach2": "string",

        "subPathAttach3": "String",

        "subPathAttach4": "string",

        "subPathAttach5": "string",

        "subDateTime": "string",

        "gradedBy": 0,

        "gradedDateTime": "string",

        "grade": 0

    }\]

  

Mandatory : Graded By ,Grade Value

Response body : 

\[    {   "submissionId": 0,

        "assignmentId": 0,

        "userId": "string",

        "subDesc": "string",

        "subComments": "string",

        "subPathAttach1": "string",

        "subPathAttach2": "string",

        "subPathAttach3": "String",

        "subPathAttach4": "string",

        "subPathAttach5": "string",

        "subDateTime": "string",

        "gradedBy": 0,

        "gradedDateTime": "string",        "grade": 0      }

\]

Status Code : 200 OK, 400 Bad Request with message and boolean success details.

  

EndFragment

  
  

  

EndFragment

StartFragment

Endpoint: /assignmentsubmission/student/{userId}

Response Body:

\[

```
{
    "submissionId": 0,
    "assignmentId": 0,
    "userId": "string",
    "subDesc": "string",
    "subComments": "string",
    "subPathAttach1": "string",
    "subPathAttach2": "string",
    "subPathAttach3": "String",
    "subPathAttach4": "string",
    "subPathAttach5": "string",
    "subDateTime": "string",
    "gradedBy": 0,
    "gradedDateTime": "string",
    "grade": 0
}

```

\]

Status Code : 200 Ok, 404 not Found with message and boolean success details.

EndFragment
